I'm pretty sure I've lost count of how many times I've promised myself I'd get my act together, only to end up stuck in this never-ending cycle of procrastination. On the other hand, there are these tiny moments where everything clicks into place, and I'm like, "Yes! I can do this!" But those moments are few and far between. Most of the time, I'm stuck in this rut, feeling like I'm drowning in a sea of uncertainty.

Sometimes I wonder if I'm just not cut out for this whole freelancing thing. Maybe I should just stick to a 9-to-5 job, where everyone else is doing the same thing, and we can all suffer through our days together. At least that way, I wouldn't feel so alone in my struggles.

But despite all this, I still try to push forward. I mean, I have to. Someone has to keep the lights on around here.
